name: attachmentBounds(for:location:textContainer:proposedLineFragment:position:)
desc: Returns the layout bounds of the attachment you specify.Required.
declaration:
func attachmentBounds(for attributes: [NSAttributedString.Key : Any], 
             location: NSTextLocation, 
        textContainer: NSTextContainer?, 
 proposedLineFragment: CGRect, 
             position: CGPoint) -> CGRect
